Public Class BindingList(Of T) Inherits Collection(Of T) Implements IBindingList, ICancelAddNew, IRaiseItemChangedEvents

generic <typename T> public ref class BindingList : System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<T>, System::ComponentModel::IBindingList, System::ComponentModel::ICancelAddNew, System::ComponentModel::IRaiseItemChangedEvents
type BindingList<'T> = class inherit Collection<'T> interface IBindingList interface ICancelAddNew interface IRaiseItemChangedEvents interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: The type of elements in the list.

summary.span: 提供支持数据绑定的泛型集合。

span.span: Provides a generic collection that supports data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以用作基类创建一个双向数据绑定机制。The class can be used as a base class to create a two-way data-binding mechanism. 提供通用的具体实现接口。 provides a concrete, generic implementation of the interface. 这是实现完整的替代方法接口，由于之间微妙的交互可能很困难， ，并显示关联。This is an alternative to implementing the complete interface, which can be difficult because of the subtle interaction between , , and the associated . 但是，典型的解决方案编程人员将使用一个类，提供数据绑定功能，如，而不是直接使用。However, the typical solutions programmer will use a class that provides data binding functionality, such as , instead of directly using . 支持创建工厂的实例通过可扩展方法。 supports factory-created instances through the extensible method. (这种类型的可扩展性，另请参阅其他类，如) 此外，由于此类实现接口，使事务提交或回滚通过新的项的和方法。(This same type of extensibility is also found in other classes, such as ) In addition, since this class implements the interface, it enables transactional commits or rollbacks of the new item through the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何绑定到组件都包含一个业务对象。The following code example demonstrates binding to a component containing a business object. 这是包含一个完整示例`Main`方法。This is a complete example that contains a `Main` method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AddingNew As AddingNewEventHandler

summary.span: 在将项添加到该列表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an item is added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生事件的新对象添加到表示的集合之前属性。The event occurs before a new object is added to the collection represented by the property. 此事件后引发调用方法时，但在之前创建新项并将其添加到内部列表。This event is raised after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the internal list. 通过处理此事件时，程序员可以提供自定义项的创建和插入行为，无需强制派生类。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 提供新的自定义项功能的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 将新项添加到集合。

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.
The item added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新项添加到表示的集合属性。The method adds a new item to the collection represented by the property. 若要添加新项，请使用以下逻辑：To add a new item, the following logic is used: 1. 自动引发事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以以编程方式处理此事件来构造新的自定义项。This event can be programmatically handled to construct a new custom item. 实现这一点在事件处理程序通过设置属性的参数的新项。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 否则，通过其公共默认构造函数自动创建新项。Otherwise, the new item is automatically created through its public default constructor. 2. 跟踪新项的位置，但它未添加到列表之前满足以下条件之一：The position of the new item is tracked, but it is not added to the list until one of the following conditions are met: - 通过调用显式提交项。The item is explicitly committed by a call to . - 项隐式提交的更改列表中，如插入或删除的项的内容的某个其他操作。The item is implicitly committed by some other operation that changed the contents of the list, such as an insertion or removal of an item. 与此相反，调用方法在项已提交之前将导致丢弃的新项。In contrast, calling the method before the item is committed will cause the new item to be discarded. 此方法将引发提交新项时的事件。This method raises the event when the new item is committed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 。. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常由其他组件以确定是否允许新项目的创建。The property is typically used by other components to determine if the creation of new items is allowed. 默认情况下`true`列表中包含的类型是否有默认构造函数或处理事件。 defaults to `true` if the type contained in the list has a default constructor or the event is handled. 如果不处理事件或列表类型不具有默认构造函数，然后默认为`false`。If the event is not handled or the list type does not have a default constructor, then defaults to `false`. 如果显式设置，设置的值将始终使用由绑定对象以确定是否可以向列表添加新项。If is explicitly set, the set value will always be used by bound objects to determine if new items can be added to the list. 是否是`true`或`false`，可以通过显式调用添加新项列表类型是否包含默认构造函数或处理事件。Whether is `true` or `false`, new items can be added by explicitly calling if the list type has a default constructor or the event is handled. 此外，设置会导致类型的事件发生。In addition, setting causes a event of type to occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件和方法允许自定义创建的项添加到列表。The event and the method allow custom-created items to be added to the list. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查列表类型，以查看是否实现接口，表明它会发出的事件各列表项上时更改属性值。 checks the list type to see if it implements the interface to indicate that it raises events of when property values are changed on individual list items. 不能在派生类中重写此成员。This member cannot be overridden in a derived class.
